## BlockDragger.updateBlockAfterMove\_() method

Updates the necessary information to place a block at a certain location.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected updateBlockAfterMove_(delta: Coordinate): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  delta | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) | The change in location from where the block started the drag to where it ended the drag. |

void
